article_title: Kalkaska Memorial Health Center, Munson Medical Center expand

article_metadata.author:
BY CAROL THOMPSON
cthompson@record-eagle.com

og.description: Kalkaska Memorial Health Center purchased the private clinic and renamed it Kalkaska Medical Associates on Sept. 1.
